<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_0586_til_post"> <x_0586_til_post action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <category display_value="Note">83f60c3e1b8154908ed631d7dc4bcbaa</category> <github_id>44</github_id> <github_url>https://github.com/iamkalai/SNTIL/issues/44</github_url> <message>g_scratchpad works in catalog client script on portal but does not on normal UI.
if (typeof g_scratchpad != 'undefined') { alert("Portal"); } else { alert("Normal UI"); }</message> <number>TIL0001038</number> <status>old</status> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-05-22 14:09:14</sys_created_on> <sys_id>f0e5bd7f1b7c90508ed631d7dc4bcb8e</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>7</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-06-03 05:52:37</sys_updated_on> <title>g_scratchpad On Portal</title> </x_0586_til_post> </record_update>
